Subskills.name: Obsidian Shield
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by shield slam.

Subskills.name: Gradient Strikes
Subskills.description: Increases the attack rating of shield slam.

Subskills.name: Groundquake Bulwark
Subskills.description: Smash your shield into the ground unleashing an earthquake pulling monsters towards you on hit. Earthquake damage and area of effect radius are increased based on your armor. Shield slam now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Concussive Bash
Subskills.description: Chance to stun enemies on hit.

Subskills.name: Skull Fracture
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned enemies.

Subskills.name: Offensive Safeguard
Subskills.description: Deal increased damage based on the block rating of your shield.

Subskills.name: Field Coverage
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect of shield slam.

Subskills.name: Violent Bash
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to increase the damage and area of effect radius of shield slam.

Subskills.name: Captain Tarethiel
Subskills.description: Throw your shield with increased size and damage. The shield returns to you after a short duration dealing additional damage. Shield slam now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Hardening Stance
Subskills.description: Chance to increase your damage return on hit for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Vanguard
Subskills.description: Gain a stack of vanguard on hit increasing your damage reduction for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Rogue Shield
Subskills.description: Chance to summon an orbiting shield on hit for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Knight's Templar
Subskills.description: Throw your shield with force causing it to bounce from the ground and terrain.

Subskills.name: Thorned Aegis
Subskills.description: Chance to gain a stack of thorned aegis on hit. Throw shields at monsters when taking damage while thorned aegis is active.
